page.title: 09A DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: MY NAME IS SALLYANNE GOODING I GET UP EIGHT O CLOCK ON SCHOOL DAYS.I GET OUT OF BED AND PUT ON MY UNIFORM.I GO DOWN STAIRS AND SIT DOWN ON A STOOL AND EAT MY BREAKFAST.WHEN I FINISH EATING MY BREAKFAST I WASH THE DISHES,AFTER WASHING THE DISHES I WIPE DOWN THE TABLE,COOKER AND THE FREEZER. AFTER THAT I GO INTO THE BATHROOM I PUT SOME WATER IN THE SINK AND GET THE FLANNEL WET AND PUT SOME SOAP ON.THEN I DRY MY HANDS.THEN I GET MY TOOTH BRUSH AND PUT TOOTH PASTE ON.THEN I GO TO SCHOOL BEFORE I GO TO SCHOOL I BRUSH MY HAIR. WHEN I FIRST GET TO SCHOOL I TAKE OF MY COAT.AT NINE O CLOCK I GO IN CLASS AND AT THE BOARD TO SEE WHAT WORK THERE IS ON THE BOARD IF THERE IS CALCULATER MATHS I ALWAYS DO THAT FIRST.THEN I DO ORDENARY MATHS AT 10.30 I FINISH THE QUESTIONS THEN I GO OUT TO PLAY.
